trans-unit.source: Provides an extensibility point for mapping WSDL contracts and policy assertions into [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] standard bindings.
Override this class to extend the standard mapping between WSDL and a standard binding.
Then attach your custom object to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> either programmatically or by using an application configuration file.

You can also attach your custom object to the internal <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> used by the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) using an application configuration file.

Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StandardBindingImporter.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IWsdlImportExtension%23BeforeImport%2A> method to directly modify the metadata that is then imported into standard binding objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.StandardBindingImporter"></xref> class.
Called prior to importing the metadata documents associated with the standard binding.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.BeforeImport%2A> methods of all registered <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> objects is called before anything is imported from the supplied metadata.
At this point, you can directly modify the metadata that is subsequently imported into standard binding objects.
The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that contains the policy elements.
Provides an extensibility point for importing WSDL contract information for standard bindings.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> for importing and resolving WSDL metadata.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext"></xref> that provides the context for the conversion from WSDL to the service description.
Provides an extensibility point for mapping endpoints defined in WSDL into the service description.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter"></xref> for importing and resolving WSDL metadata.
